chiSiamo.title: ABOUT US
chiSiamo.description: Spazio ai Ciompi is a venue dedicated to <bold>cultural events, exhibitions, workshops, classes, and professional meetings</bold>.

doveSiamo.title: OUR LOCATION
doveSiamo.description:
We are located in the <bold>heart</bold> of <bold>Florence</bold>, in one of the most <bold>iconic</bold> squares of the historic <bold>S. Ambrogio</bold> district.

Piazza de Ciompi, 17
doveSiamo.noConsent: To view the map, please accept cookies.

info.title: INFO
info.booking:
To <bold>book</bold> this space, send a <bold>message</bold> via <linkWhatsApp>WhatsApp</linkWhatsApp> or <linkSMS>SMS</linkSMS> to the number <linkNumber>+39 371 766 5575</linkNumber>

Alternatively, send an <bold>email</bold> to <linkEmail>spazioaiciompi@gmail.com</linkEmail>

The <bold>main room</bold> is <bold>40sqm</bold>

The venue also offers <bold>sanitary facilities</bold> and an additional <bold>separate area</bold> for preparing cold food and drinks

There are <bold>two entrances</bold>: one faces the square, the other is accessible from inside the building.

Available for booking <bold>every day</bold> of the week

Operating hours are from <bold>10:00</bold> to <bold>23:00</bold>

cookiePolicy.title: Privacy & Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.privacyDescription: This page explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (<bold>GDPR - EU Regulation 2016/679</bold>).

dataCollected.item1: Data provided voluntarily (e.g. email, name when you contact us).
dataCollected.item2: Browsing data (e.g. IP addresses, analytics data, cookies).

cookiePolicy.dataUsageTitle: Why do we collect this data?

dataUsage.item1: To respond to inquiries and contacts.
dataUsage.item2: To analyze site visits in order to improve functionality.
dataUsage.item3: To integrate external services such as Google Maps.

cookiePolicy.googleMapsDescription: This site uses <bold>Google Maps</bold> to display our venue's location. Google may collect information from users interacting with the map, including IP addresses and location data. <link>Google Privacy Policy</link>.
cookiePolicy.userRightsDescription: Under the GDPR, you have the right to access, modify, or delete your data. For requests, please contact us at <link>spazioaiciompi@gmail.com</link>.
cookiePolicy.cookieDescription: This site uses <bold>cookies</bold> to enhance your browsing experience and to collect statistical data.

cookieTypes.essentialDescription: Necessary for the operation of the site.
cookieTypes.analyticsDescription: Collect anonymous data on visits (e.g. Google Analytics).
cookieTypes.thirdPartyDescription: Used by external services such as Google Maps.
